name: CPContentStyle
desc: The types of content style that the vehicle allows.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a content style from a raw value.

items.name: static var dark: CPContentStyle
items.desc: The indication from the vehicle to draw the content in a dark style.

items.name: static var light: CPContentStyle
items.desc: The indication from the vehicle to draw the content in a light style.
